For some homeworks we use parts of online courses from Datacamp. For participation you need to fill in this [google form](https://goo.gl/forms/ZvBrI96U4n2hOuFX2). Then you will receive an invitation to Datacamp.

For Homework 2, please, complete the following chapters of the course ["Introduction to R"](https://www.datacamp.com/courses/free-introduction-to-r):

* Vectors (Chapter 2, all assignments)
* Factors (Chapter 4, all assignments before *Battle of sexes*)
* Data Frames (Chapter 5, all assignments before *Only planets with rings that are shorter*)

Please send the progress of the online course (a screenshot where your name/login/email is readable) to the [course assistant](mailto:irina.nikishina@mail.ru) until 23:59 03.02.2019.

Feel free to ask any questions concerning tasks and Datacamp interface.
